column5: Lowrance just posted it yesterday:  Lowrance 4.0
easy upgrade  boots up quicker now  and locks on to shallow deeps easier......  you can do a setup after the upgrade and set it for an icefishing machine too...

Glad to hear this got posted. Biggest complaint is boot time and choppyness on the chart/sonar. Other fixes:  http://www.lowrance.com/upload/Lowrance/Documents/Software_Updates/HDS_4.0_release_notes.pdf
Thanks guys ... Sure glad I ain't on dial-up any more.
Thanks for the head's up .  I can't wait to run the side scan and down scan imaging  Slayer
